name: Bug´s Luck
description:
You are about to play Bug´s Luck!This is a game that combines randomness and tower defense mechanics to create a new and we may even dare to say fun game.

Pick up your dice and try your luck,! Fight hordes of bugs with... plants??? 

 Ok, this sounds like a "plant vs zombies" rip off but go on....

Bug´s Luck was created withing 48 hours and we are very proud of the result. We worked very hard on this project and we only hope for you guys to enjoy it as much as we enjoyed working on it.

Thank you so much for your support and have fun!

:)
